mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_MANAGE SET MBR_PW=#{password} WHERE MBR_ID=#{id} AND MBR_EML_ADDR=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_MANAGE (MBR_ID, MBR_PW, MBR_NM, MBR_NICKNAME, MBR_EML_ADDR, MBR_TELNO, MBR_GRD_NO, MBR_REG_YMD) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'uln_301', NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT MBR_ID AS id, MBR_NM AS name FROM MEMBER_MANAGE WHERE MBR_ID = #{id} AND MBR_PW = #{password}
